artifacts.tooltip.item.antidote_vessel: Greatly reduces the duration of negative effects
artifacts.tooltip.item.aqua_dashers: Allows the wearer to walk on fluids while sprinting
artifacts.tooltip.item.charm_of_sinking: Allows the wearer to move freely in water
artifacts.tooltip.item.cloud_in_a_bottle: Allows the wearer to double jump
artifacts.tooltip.item.cross_necklace: Increases the length of invincibility after taking damage
artifacts.tooltip.item.digging_claws.min: Increases the wearer's base mining level to %s
artifacts.tooltip.item.drinking_hat.drin: Decreases the time it takes to drink items
artifacts.tooltip.item.drinking_hat.eati: Decreases the time it takes to eat items
artifacts.tooltip.item.drinking_hat.spec: 'Hey! I'm #1, and I let gravity do my drinking!'
artifacts.tooltip.item.fire_gauntlet: Causes the wearer's melee attacks to deal fire damage
artifacts.tooltip.item.flame_pendant.fir: Grants fire resistance after lighting an attacker on fire
artifacts.tooltip.item.flame_pendant.str: Has a chance to light attackers on fire
artifacts.tooltip.item.helium_flamingo.k: Press %s while in the air to start swimming
artifacts.tooltip.item.helium_flamingo.s: Allows the wearer to swim in the air for a limited period of time.
artifacts.tooltip.item.lucky_scarf.multi: Applies %s extra levels of fortune to mined blocks
artifacts.tooltip.item.lucky_scarf.singl: Applies an extra level of fortune to mined blocks
artifacts.tooltip.item.night_vision_gogg: Allows the wearer to see in the dark
artifacts.tooltip.item.obsidian_skull: The wearer becomes temporarily immune to fire damage when hurt by fire
artifacts.tooltip.item.panic_necklace: Increases the wearer's movement speed after taking damage
artifacts.tooltip.item.pocket_piston: Increases knockback dealt by the wearer
artifacts.tooltip.item.power_glove: Increases damage dealt by the wearer
artifacts.tooltip.item.running_shoes.mov: Increases the wearer's movement speed while sprinting
artifacts.tooltip.item.running_shoes.ste: Increases the wearer's step height while sprinting
artifacts.tooltip.item.shock_pendant.str: Has a chance to strike attackers with lightning
artifacts.tooltip.item.snorkel: Allows the wearer to breathe underwater
artifacts.tooltip.item.superstitious_hat: Applies %s extra levels of looting to killed entities
Applies an extra level of looting to killed entities
artifacts.tooltip.item.thorn_pendant: Has a chance to damage attackers
artifacts.tooltip.item.umbrella.shield: Can be used as a shield
artifacts.tooltip.item.vampiric_glove: Causes the wearer's melee attacks to absorb health
artifacts.tooltip.item.villager_hat: Decreases the trading prices of villagers

Affects how common artifacts are in chests
Values above 1 will make artifacts rarer
Values between 0 and 1 will make artifacts more common
Set this to 10000 to remove all artifacts from chest loot
